mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ec_fund_oper_load_log( id, shop_fund_id, fund_field_type_id, fund, remain_fund, note, oper_by, oper_date, relate_id, fund_type ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{shopFundId}, (SELECT s.id FROM ec_fund_field_type AS s WHERE s.value=#{fundFieldType.code} LIMIT 1), #{fund}, #{remainFund}, #{note}, #{createBy.id}, NOW(), #{relateId}, #{fundType} )
